lg.l: \1731\ I am half dead to Day with a Headach, the Consequence of dancing, supping, & sitting up last Night at the D. of Newcastles; & supose I shall from the Prince's Ball to night, be carry'd off in a Herse. the Entertainment last Night was the most magnificent, the easyest, the best understood & the best order'd Thing I ever saw in my Life. the Duke of Lorrain is as great a Romp as you or me. I write this from the Council-Board, & hear so much of the Indies, Plantations, Ships Troops &c──that I am quite confounded in what I write however I must try to recollect a French Epigram I heard last night repeated on the Cardinal Fleuri, the bitterest the cleannest & the strongest Satyr I ever saw in my Life.

\1732\ I have sent you inclosed a Paraphrastical Translation of the Epigram on Cardll 08 08── Fleury; a bad Imitation & a very unjust Application of a very good Original. Ld 08- & Lady Albemarle are to dine here & it is near three a Clock & I in my Nightgown therefore I must bid you Adieu, when you say so to Redlynch I shall be happy. the Town is as empty as at Midsummer, which can be no great Inducement to any Body to visit it I own.
1731 linesConfondant du Passè le leger souvenir,
Ebloui du Present, sans percer l'Avenir;
Dans l'·Art de gouvener, decrepit & Novice
Punissant la Vertu, recompensant le Vice:
Malgrè sa tète altiere, accablè de son Rang,
Fourbe dans le Petit, & Dupe dans le Grand:
On connoit dans ces Traits, sans meme gu'on le nomme
Le Maitre de la France, & le Valet de Rome.1732 linesOf Favour & Fortune unmerited, vain,
A Sharper in Trifles, a Dupe in the Main;
Atchieving of Nothing, still promissing Wonders,
By Dint of Experience improving in Blunders:
Opressing true Merit, exalting the Base,
And selling his Country, to purchase a Peace.
A Iobber of Stock by relating false News,
A Prater at Court, in the Style of the Stews.
Of Virtue & Worth by Profession a Giber,
Of Iuries & Senates the Bully & Briber.
Tho I name not the Wretch, you know who I mean,
'Tis the Cur-Dog of Britain, & the Spaniel of Spain.
